pullRequest.title: Updates analytics related scopes.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Some of the analytics related scopes has been deprecated and new scopes need to be added.
Goals
Adding recently introduced analytics related scopes.
Automation tests

Integration tests
Tested the rendering locally.

Security checks

Followed secure coding standards in http://wso2.com/technical-reports/wso2-secure-engineering-guidelines? yes
Ran FindSecurityBugs plugin and verified report? N/A
Confirmed that this PR doesn't commit any keys, passwords, tokens, usernames, or other secrets? yes

nodes.bodyText: the admin portal does not list down a default role "Internal/analytics".
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -149,55 +149,61 @@ This will update all scope mappings in tenant-conf.json with Internal/creator as
 !!! info 
     Under default configurations following are the scopes allowed for each deafult Internal role.
     
-    | Role                                   | admin   | Internal/publisher   | Internal/creator   | Internal/subscriber   | Internal/analytics   | Internal/everyone   |
-    |-- ------------------------------------ | ------- | -------------------- | ------------------ | --------------------- | -------------------- | ----------------- --|
-    | apim:api_publish                       | ✓ | ✓              |                    |                       |                      |                     |
-    | apim:api_create                        | ✓ |                      | ✓            |                       |                      |                     |
-    | apim:api_view                          | ✓ | ✓              | ✓            |                       | ✓              |                     |
-    | apim:api_delete                        | ✓ |                      | ✓            |                       |                      |                     |
